name: UpdateOauthClient
description:
Update an existing OAuth client configuration.

This tool updates an existing OAuth client, triggering token validation with the OAuth server. Requires admin or owner role permissions.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the OAuth client resource to update.

parameters.name: accept_versioning_header
parameters.description: The `Accept` header for versioning purposes, specifying the desired API version.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specify the content type format for the request, typically 'application/json'.

parameters.name: oauth_client_name
parameters.description: A human-readable name for the OAuth client.

value_schema.description: A human-readable name for the OAuth client

parameters.name: oauth_client_id
parameters.description: The OAuth client ID as provided by the OAuth server.

value_schema.description: The OAuth client ID provided by the OAuth server

parameters.name: oauth_client_secret
parameters.description: The OAuth client secret provided by the OAuth server for authentication.

value_schema.description: The OAuth client secret provided by the OAuth server

parameters.name: oauth_scopes_requested
parameters.description: The OAuth scopes requested for this client. Provide as a space-separated string.

value_schema.description: The OAuth scopes requested for this client

parameters.name: oauth_token_endpoint_url
parameters.description: The URL for the OAuth token endpoint required for this client.

parameters.name: oauth_grant_type
parameters.description: Specifies the OAuth grant type to use, currently only 'client_credentials' is supported. Always use 'client_credentials' as input.

value_schema.description: The OAuth grant type (currently only client_credentials is supported)
